title: Select Marriott Hotels Near SeaWorld Orlando Entice October Travelers With Special PerksTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Select Marriott Hotels Near SeaWorld Orlando Entice October Travelers With Special Perks
Travelers heading to Orlando this October are in for a sea of fun, sun and spooks when they head to SeaWorld’s Halloween Spooktacular while enjoying all of the perks of Official SeaWorld hotels by Marriott.
Summer might be over, but the fun is just heating up in the Sunshine State. Renaissance Orlando at SeaWorld, SpringHill Suites Orlando at SeaWorld, Fairfield Inn & Suites Orlando at SeaWorld and Residence Inn Orlando at SeaWorld invite guests to make a splash with easy access to SeaWorld’s Halloween Spooktacular.
It’s an ocean of Halloween fun for the whole family at SeaWorld Orlando’s Halloween Spooktacular®. During this daytime event, families are immersed in an underwater “fantasea” including trick-or-treating, whimsical pumpkin fish, sea-themed arts and crafts and up-close animal encounters in a family-friendly event that could only come from SeaWorld. SeaWorld Orlando’s Halloween Spooktacular® runs weekends, October 3-25, 2015 , and is included with park admission.
Just steps from SeaWorld’s Halloween Spooktacular®, Marriott’s kid-friendly hotels in Orlando are never short on fun. As official SeaWorld® hotels, Renaissance Orlando, SpringHill Suites, Fairfield Inn & Suites and Residence Inn Orlando at SeaWorld invite guests to make the most of their experience with a variety of exciting and exclusive benefits, including:
Complimentary quick queue at SeaWorld® Complimentary transportation to SeaWorld® Orlando , Aquatica Orlando, Discovery Cove Orlando and Universal Studios® Orlando with reservations Complimentary access to the SeaWorld Rescue Tour® 10 percent off dining at SeaWorld® and Aquatica Orlando 10 percent off merchandise purchases of $50 or more at SeaWorld® and Aquatica Orlando Early entry into SeaWorld® and Aquatica Orlando on select dates
Following a fun-filled day, tired travelers can retreat to the comfort and convenience of the SeaWorld partner hotels. Large guest rooms and suites give families plenty of space to spread out while feeling at home with high-speed Internet access, flat-panel TVs, large bathrooms and luxurious bedding.
During downtime, exciting resort-style pools and state-of-the-art fitness centers will keep visitors active and entertained.
When it’s time to fuel up for another day of fun, guests of SpringHill Suites, Fairfield Inn & Suites and Residence Inn Orlando at SeaWorld will enjoy a complimentary hot breakfast buffet served daily.
Join Marriott Rewards now and earn points that can be redeemed for free hotel stays and room upgrades at 3,800 hotels in over 70 countries.
Source: Marriott Hotels
